name: KiltSayings

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kilt sayings
des: Get ready for some kilty wisdom from Kevin (KT) the Kiltman's Kiltology volumes. Over 200 sayings included, every time you open the skill a new random saying will be read to you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
